title: Frequent FPS drops
body:
Hello,

First of all, if this is not the place for these kind of questions, I'm sorry but I do not know where else to ask it. 
I bought a new laptop (Acer Aspire A515-51G) and am experience some troubles in game. Most of the time my FPS is around 100-180, but very frequently is drops to around 5-15 for a few seconds.
My guess is that this is some settings issue from my laptop. Is there anyone who knows what I can do to prevent this from happening? 

Kind regards,

Stann

replies.body:
If it's really random like that, I'm actually curious if it's a specific game file or something causing it. Try running a quick repair and test it in a custom game. Also be sure to check for any possible driver updates since you mentioned it being a new laptop.

Let me know if drivers and a repair aren't helping, still a couple other steps we could try.

Hello, 

I tried both but it has not changed anything for me.

Try checking for any possible DirectX drivers as well, and check to make sure the Game DVR Bar is turned off too. On that note, go ahead and make sure any overlays from things like Discord or other programs like Razr Synapse are turned off as well. If that's not helping our techs might need to take a much closer look for you in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
Could you fix the problem? I'm having the same issues also with an Aspire A515-51g
Same here, but im on a pc....i shouldnt be getting these fps drops to begin with....
